languages.text: "Вы проедете по известной вам дороге отсюда и до звездной гавани. Вас будут сопровождать соратники и почетный караул. Тело еретички, так называемой "пророчицы Зари", повезут за вами, как боевой трофей. В середине дороги планируется остановка, там к вам кинутся благодарные граждане и будут возносить хвалу за спасение".

"You will take the road, now familiar to you, from here to the starport. You will be accompanied by your comrades-in-arms and a guard of honour. The body of the heretic known as 'the prophet Aurora' will be pulled in your wake as a battle trophy. A stop is planned in the middle of the road. There, grateful citizens will rush toward you, praising you for their salvation."
languages.original_text: "Вы проедете по известной вам дороге отсюда и до звездной гавани. Вас будут сопровождать соратники и почетный караул. Тело еретички, так называемой "пророчицы Зари", повезут за вами, как боевой трофей. В середине дороги планируется остановка, там к вам кинутся благодарные граждане и будут возносить хвалу за спасение".

traits.locale_text: "You will take the road, now familiar to you, from here to the celestial harbour. You will be accompanied by your comrades-in-arms and a guard of honour. The body of the heretic known as 'the prophet Aurora' will be pulled in your wake as a battle trophy. A stop is planned in the middle of the road. There, grateful citizens will rush towards you, praising you for their salvation."

There, grateful citizens will rush toward you, praising you for their salvation."

languages.text: "Ihr nehmt die Straße, die Euch inzwischen schon vertraut ist, von hier zum Raumhafen. Dabei werdet Ihr von Euren Waffenkameraden und einer Ehrengarde begleitet. Die Leiche der Ketzerin, die als 'Prophetin Aurora' bekannt ist, wird als Kampftrophäe hinter Euch hergezogen. Auf halbem Weg wird ein kurzer Stopp eingelegt. Dort werden dankbare Bürger auf Euch zustürmen und Euch dafür preisen, dass Ihr sie gerettet habt."
languages.original_text: "You will take the road, now familiar to you, from here to the starport. You will be accompanied by your comrades-in-arms and a guard of honour. The body of the heretic known as 'the prophet Aurora' will be pulled in your wake as a battle trophy. A stop is planned in the middle of the road. There, grateful citizens will rush toward you, praising you for their salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr nehmt die Straße, die Euch inzwischen schon vertraut ist, von hier zum Raumhafen. Dabei werdet Ihr von Euren Waffenkameraden und einer Ehrengarde begleitet. Die Leiche der Ketzerin, die als 'Prophetin Aurora' bekannt ist, wird als Kampftrophäe hinter Euch hergezogen. Auf halbem Weg wird ein kurzer Stopp eingelegt. Dort werden dankbare Bürger auf Euch zustürmen und Euch dafür preisen, dass Ihr sie gerettet habt."

languages.text: « Vous emprunterez la route, qui vous est désormais familière, d'ici jusqu'à l'astroport. Vous serez {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} de vos compagnons d'armes et d'une garde d'honneur. Le corps de l'hérétique appelée "la prophétesse Aurore" sera traîné derrière vous comme un trophée. Une halte est prévue au milieu de la route. Là, des citoyens reconnaissants accourront vers vous et vous loueront d'avoir assuré leur salut. »
languages.original_text: "You will take the road, now familiar to you, from here to the starport. You will be accompanied by your comrades-in-arms and a guard of honour. The body of the heretic known as 'the prophet Aurora' will be pulled in your wake as a battle trophy. A stop is planned in the middle of the road. There, grateful citizens will rush toward you, praising you for their salvation."

traits.locale_text: « Vous emprunterez la route, qui vous est désormais familière, d'ici jusqu'à l'astroport. Vous serez {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} de vos compagnons d'armes et d'une garde d'honneur. Le corps de l'hérétique appelée "la prophétesse Aurore" sera traîné derrière vous comme un trophée. Une halte est prévue au milieu de la route. Là, des citoyens reconnaissants accourront vers vous et vous loueront d'avoir assuré leur salut. »

languages.text: “巡礼的街道您已经很熟悉了。您会走过这条街道，从这里一直走到星港，您的战友与仪仗队会陪同您一起前进。至于那个被称为‘极光’先知的异端分子尸体，则会被拉在您的身后，作为战利品进行巡展。我们计划在路中间停一会，到时候满心感激的市民会奔向您，赞美您拯救了他们。”
languages.original_text: "You will take the road, now familiar to you, from here to the starport. You will be accompanied by your comrades-in-arms and a guard of honour. The body of the heretic known as 'the prophet Aurora' will be pulled in your wake as a battle trophy. A stop is planned in the middle of the road. There, grateful citizens will rush toward you, praising you for their salvation."

traits.locale_text: “巡礼的街道您已经很熟悉了。您会走过这条街道，从这里一直走到星港，您的战友与仪仗队会陪同您一起前进。至于那个被称为‘极光’先知的异端分子尸体，则会被拉在您的身后，作为战利品进行巡展。我们计划在路中间停一会，到时候满心感激的市民会奔向您，赞美您拯救了他们。”

languages.text: 「進んでいただくのはここからスターポートまでです。もはや、この経路はお馴染みですね。陛下には、お仲間と儀仗兵が同行します。陛下の通った後を『預言者オーロラ』として知れた異端者の死体が戦利品として引きずられていきます。道路の真ん中で停止する予定です。そこで、国民達が感謝して駆け寄り、あなたの救済を讃えます」
languages.original_text: "You will take the road, now familiar to you, from here to the starport. You will be accompanied by your comrades-in-arms and a guard of honour. The body of the heretic known as 'the prophet Aurora' will be pulled in your wake as a battle trophy. A stop is planned in the middle of the road. There, grateful citizens will rush toward you, praising you for their salvation."

traits.locale_text: 「進んでいただくのはここからスターポートまでです。もはや、この経路はお馴染みですね。陛下には、お仲間と儀仗兵が同行します。陛下の通った後を『預言者オーロラ』として知れた異端者の死体が戦利品として引きずられていきます。道路の真ん中で停止する予定です。そこで、国民達が感謝して駆け寄り、あなたの救済を讃えます」

languages.text: «Irá por el camino, ya familiar para usted, desde aquí hasta el puerto estelar. Le acompañarán sus camaradas y una guardia de honor. El cuerpo de la hereje conocida como "la profeta Aurora" será arrastrado a su paso como trofeo de batalla. Está prevista una parada en medio de la carretera. Allí, ciudadanos agradecidos correrán hacia usted, alabándole por su salvación».
languages.original_text: "You will take the road, now familiar to you, from here to the starport. You will be accompanied by your comrades-in-arms and a guard of honour. The body of the heretic known as 'the prophet Aurora' will be pulled in your wake as a battle trophy. A stop is planned in the middle of the road. There, grateful citizens will rush toward you, praising you for their salvation."

traits.locale_text: «Irá por el camino, ya familiar para usted, desde aquí hasta el puerto estelar. Le acompañarán sus camaradas y una guardia de honor. El cuerpo de la hereje conocida como "la profeta Aurora" será arrastrado a su paso como trofeo de batalla. Está prevista una parada en medio de la carretera. Allí, ciudadanos agradecidos correrán hacia usted, alabándole por su salvación».

languages.text: "Artık vâkıf olduğunuz yolu kullanarak buradan yıldız limanına ilerleyeceksiniz. Size silah arkadaşlarınızın yanı sıra bir de şeref kıtası eşlik edecek. 'Peygamber Aurora' denen o kâfirin cesedi, savaş ganimeti olarak peşiniz sıra çekilecek. Yolun ortasında bir duraklama planlanıyor. Orada, minnettar yurttaşlar etrafınızı saracak ve kendilerini kurtardığınız için size övgüler düzecekler."
languages.original_text: "You will take the road, now familiar to you, from here to the starport. You will be accompanied by your comrades-in-arms and a guard of honour. The body of the heretic known as 'the prophet Aurora' will be pulled in your wake as a battle trophy. A stop is planned in the middle of the road. There, grateful citizens will rush toward you, praising you for their salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Bundan böyle vâkıf olduğunuz yoldan yıldız limanına gideceksiniz. Silahlı yoldaşlarınız ve bir şeref kıtası, refakatçiniz olacak. Peygamber Aurora olarak bilinen kâfirin cesedi, savaş ganimeti olarak ardınızdan sergilenecek. Yolculuk esnasında bir mola verilecek. Oraya vardığımız vakit minnettar vatandaşlar etrafınıza üşüşecek, onları kurtardığınız için ayaklarınıza kapanacak."
